message:
[Non development post]
I encountered a performance bottleneck with my new SSD and after a lot of diagnosing trials, it was for my surprise that my "Marvell SE9128 Sata 3 chipset" is the main reason :( ... If anyone of you is having a performance problems with Sata 3.0 SSDs, check your chipset first. To sum the result up for you,  Marvel is the worst.
story: Mahmoud Abd El-Fattah shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Battle of the SATA 3.0 Controllers – Techgage
caption: techgage.com
description: With newer SSDs now coming well within 10% of maxing out a SATA 3.0 port, it’s important to make sure that your motherboard is properly equipped to handle such drives if planning to buy one. In our testing, while AMD’s and Intel’s solutions offered superb performance, Marvell’s leaved a bit (or a lo…
